mods.name: Normal Mode
mods.desc: Unlock recipes, obtain loot, and complete quests based on a chosen profession and magic discipline. Once you finish the quest line for your class, you may unlock additional classes. Designed with multiplayer in mind. Good for players who enjoy a gradual, divergent progression system. Also good for new players, since you are exposed to new mods gradually.

mods.name: No Class Mode
mods.desc: Play unrestricted by the class selection system, although the quest book will not change. A more classic magiculture experience. Good for players who dislike the questing system, or for players who don't care for gradual progression.
